tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_data_anomalies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_id INT,
  outlier_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  datetime TIMESTAMP,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE AnomalyDetection (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_data_id INT,
  anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
  anomaly_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE QualityControl (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  anomaly_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE AnomalyLog (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  anomaly_id INT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  logged_by VARCHAR(100),
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE production_data_anomalies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(100),
  last_interaction TIMESTAMP,
  anomaly_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  total_anomalies INT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_type VARCHAR(50),
  log_message TEXT
)
